data.message:
You want to explain to me WHY your continuously allowing pages that promote hate speech towards autistic children to be created over and over again????? Doesn't send a good message to what Facebook believes in. This is an ongoing problem that needs to be addressed and stopped for good.
Just now

replies.message: Hi Mandy. The best way to report abusive content on Facebook is by using the Report link that appears near the content you would like to report. For some examples and to learn more, visit our Help Center at: https://www.Facebook.com/help/www/181495968648557/ -Chantal
"Exterminate all autisics" look it up it's hate speech they continuously make these pages
Thank you Joe I will definitely do that
